TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TickBarPlacement extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the placement of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"> with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TickBarPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>. The actual position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property identifies this position so that the ticks of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> are drawn correctly. The following illustration shows how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> controls are drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property is set to F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement.Top?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True and F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement.Bottom?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
![TickBar placement](../../add/media/tickbarplacement.png "TickBar placement")
## Examples For an example of a T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True that is included in the T:System.Windows.Style?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True of a T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, see [Slider Styles and Templates](../Topic/Slider%20Styles%20and%20Templates.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement Bottom = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The tick bar is positioned below the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement Left = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tick bar is positioned to the left of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement Right = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The tick bar is positioned to the right of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement Top = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The tick bar is positioned above the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
